document_data.mainbody: ing Irbruin was born in the Year of the Defiant Stone, 127 DR the second son of Dorglor I. He was the 13th Obarskyr monarch and a king of Cormyr, beginning his reign in the Year of the Pirates Port, 145 DR at the death of his uncle Embrold. He and his firstborn son Faerlthind were slain together in Year of the Weary Warrior, 169 DR, and the throne passed instead to his second son Moriann.
